ai-thag4.1:1.1_0: I was adorned with jewelry and all dressed up,
ai-thag4.1:1.2_0: with garlands, and sandalwood makeup piled on,
ai-thag4.1:1.3_0: along the main street is a lady—
ai-thag4.1:1.4_0: a dancer dancing as the music plays.
ai-thag4.1:2.2_0: and while walking along I glanced at her,
ai-thag4.1:4.2_0: Just one rainy season after I went forth,
